Verses: 1 aabiraamudaiya Manaiviyaagiya Saaraaikkup Pillaiyillaadhirundhadhu. Egipthu Dhesaththaalaagiya Aagaar Ennum Perkonda Oru Adimaip Pen Avalukku Irundhaal.

2 saaraai Aabiraamai Nokki: Naan Pillaiperaadhapadikkuk Karththar En Garppaththai Adaiththirukkiraar; En Adimaip Pennode Serum, Oruvelai Avalaal En Veedu Kattappadum Endraal. Saaraayin Vaarththaikku Aabiraam Sevikoduththaan.

3 aabiraam Kaanaan Dhesaththil Paththu Varusham Kudiyirundhapinbu, Aabiraamin Manaiviyaagiya Saaraai Egipthu Dhesaththaalaana Than Adimaippennaagiya Aagaarai Azhaiththu, Avalaith Than Purushanaagiya Aabiraamukku Marumanaiyaattiyaagak Koduththaal.
4 avan Aagaarode Serndhapodhu, Aval Garppanthariththaal; Aval Thaan Garppavadhiyaanadhaik Kandapodhu, Than Naachchiyaarai Arpamaaga Enninaal

5 appozhudhu Saaraai Aabiraamai Nokki: Enakku Neritta Aniyaayam Umadhumel Sumarum; En Adimaip Pennai Ummudaiya Madiyile Koduththen; Aval Thaan Karppavadhiyaanadhaik Kandu Ennai Arpamaaga Ennugiraal; Karththar Enakkum Umakkum Nadunindru Nyaayantheerppaaraaga Endraal.

6 adharku Aabiraam Saaraayai Nokki: Idho, Un Adimaippen Un Kaikkul Irukkiraal; Un Paarvaikku Nalamaanapadi Avalukku Sey Endraan. Appozhudhu Saaraai Avalaik Kadinamaai Nadaththinapadiyaal Aval Avalaivittu Odipponaal.
7 karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avalai Vanaandharaththile Soorukkuppogira Vazhiyaruge Irukkira Neerootrandaiyil Kandu:
8 saaraayin Adimaippennaagiya Aagaare, Engeyirundhu Varugiraai? Enge Pogiraai? Endru Kettaar; Aval: Naan En Naachchiyaaraagiya Saaraayaivittu Odippogiren Endraal.
9 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar: Nee Un Naachchiyaarandaikkuth Thirumbippoi, Aval Kaiyinkeezh Adangiyiru Endraar.
10 pinnum Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avalai Nokki: Un Sandhadhiyai Migavum Perugappannuven; Adhu Perugi, Ennimudiyaadhadhaayirukkum Endraar.
11 pinnum Karththarudaiya Thoodhanaanavar Avalai Nokki: Nee Garppavadhiyaayirukkiraai, Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaai; Karththar Un Angalaaippaik Kettapadiyinaal, Avanukku Ismavel Endru Periduvaayaaga.
12 avan Dhushtamanushanaayiruppaan; Avanudaiya Kai Ellaarukkum Virodhamaagavum, Ellaarudaiya Kaiyum Avanukku Virodhamaagavum Irukkum; Than Sagodharar Ellaarukkum Edhiraagak Kudiyiruppaan Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Aval: Ennaik Kaanbavarai Naanum Ivvidaththil Kanden Allavaa Endru Solli, Thannode Pesina Karththarukku Neer Ennaik Kaangira Dhevan Endru Perittaal.
14 aagaiyaal, Andhath Thuravu Peyar Lakaairoyee Ennappattadhu; Adhu Kaadhesukkum Paareththukkum Naduve Irukkiradhu.
15 aagaar Aabiraamukku Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal; Aabiraam Aagaar Petra Than Kumaaranukku Ismavel Endru Perittaan.
16 aagaar Aabiraamukku Ismavelaip Petrapodhu, Aabiraam Enbaththaaru Vayadhaayirundhaan.
